name: Loot & Leave
description:
You Are On A Mission To Explore A Planet That Is Not Listed. 

When You Start The Landing With Your Shuttle, An Unexpected Gravitational Pull  Make Your Ship Crash Land On The Surface. 

You Luckily Survived This Crash. 

You Quickly Realize That You Are NOT ALONE Here. A Giant Creature Is Moving Towards Your Location. The System Calculates You Have Five Minutes Left. 

You Need To Repair Parts Of Your Ship , Loot As Much Ressources As You Can And Then Pack Your Stuff And Leave!
